homePage.label: Home Page
homePage.title: Extension Proxy IPv4
homePage.authSupport: The Google Chrome browser supports authentication for the SOCKS protocol only through the use of IP addresses.

auth.extensionSignInDescription: To use the Proxy IPv4 extension, log in or create an account
auth.recoveryInfo: Enter the email address you provided during registration. We will send you instructions to restore access to it.

noIps.title: There is no ip
noIps.description: There will be a list of IPs when they appear.

settings.label: Settings
settings.title: Settings
settings.timezoneInfo: When the function is enabled, the time zone corresponding to the country of the proxy will be substituted for the session
settings.languageInfo: When you enable the function for the session, the language of the headers corresponding to the country of the proxy will be substituted

bug.title: Report a bug
bug.label: Report a bug
bug.reportSuccessMessage: Your bug report has been successfully received

forms.invalidMessage: Message must be at least 10 characters
forms.wrongPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
forms.wrongPasswordChars: Password must contain only latin characters and digits

notifications.checkEmail: Check your email! A notification has been sent to you!
